useKcpTransport.title: Use KCP Transport
useKcpTransport.tooltip: Use alternative transport that requires port forwarding but seems to be more reliable. The port to forward is 7777. Use this if you are having trouble connecting.

defaultServerIP.title: Last Entered IP/ID
defaultServerIP.tooltip: Used if you leave the connect prompt blank.

incompatibleModsAllowed.title: Incompatible Mods Allowed
incompatibleModsAllowed.tooltip: Kicks players if they have certain mods.

showPlayerNames.title: Show Player Names
showPlayerNames.tooltip: Shows player names in the HUD and the map view.

shipDamage.title: Ship Damage
shipDamage.tooltip: Take impact damage when inside the ship.

showExtraHud.title: Show Extra HUD Elements
showExtraHud.tooltip: Show extra HUD elements, like player status and minimap icons.
